headline: Guidance for Climate-Conscious Investing, From the Church of England
abstract: The churchâ€™s pension fund will invest 600 million pounds in companies ranked according to their efforts to meet the 2015 Paris agreement.
lead_paragraph: Many investors would like to use their money to help tackle climate change, but figuring out how has not always been easy. Now a fund that benefits 38,000 current and retired clergy and other employees of the Church of England could offer a potential solution.
